title: Mastery System
body: I am about to hit 100k Masteries On {{champion:157}} And I was Just wondering, Why don't we get any rewards for playing Champions to this extent. Something link a Skin or a Icon Could be nice to show who we play or show how much time we put in the game.

replies.body: you will when level 6 and 7 mastery are added. Plus playing that much SHOULD mean you will very good on the champion.

^ Riot are working on rewards for tier 6 and 7 masteries, and since the mastery ranks are based on points, you will likely get mastery 7 on Yas when they come out.

No timeline on when or details on what yet, though. Unfortunately they have a whole bunch of other systems to sort out with NCS/Hextech and various other things they always have going on, but they'll be out when they're ready :)
pretty sure they already teased the icon for the new mastery tiers, edited version of the champs profile picture
Yeah I remember seeing the badges on S@20 a while back, I think the points needed for ranks 6/7 are also on the wiki though those will likely change.
